response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet high standards. It comes with a range of features designed to enhance your experience and efficiency. Given its quality and functionality, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $120. Considering this, I'm offering you the opportunity to own it for $150. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the value we place on customer satisfaction. I trust you'll find the product invaluable. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 150}
